subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Beatriz Recari of Spain, Ryann O’Toole of California and Giulia Sergas of Italy each shot a three-under-par 69 in the second women’s major championship of the year.
snippet: Beatriz Recari of Spain, Ryann O’Toole of California and Giulia Sergas of Italy each shot a three-under-par 69 in the second women’s major championship of the year.
